Robert Genetti

Data Analyst

LinkedIn
I am a problem solver who has a passion for data and a focus on presenting actionable insights. My skills as a Data Analyst are in technical tools, statistical analysis, and economic research.
As a data analyst I am proficient in conducting extensive data analysis and developing actionable insights. Additionally, I have develop a deep understanding of applied economics using statistical methods of inference.
My goal is to build upon these skills and further strengthening my technical, leadership and presentation skills.
